span.title: Delay between shots; lower number means higher fire rate
Number of seconds it takes to reload

tr.td: Starting gun of The Hunter . Does not crack secret walls .
Starting gun of The Marine . Does not crack secret walls .
Fires short-range, inaccurate lasers. Starting gun of The Pilot . Does not crack secret walls .
Starting gun of The Convict . Does not crack secret walls .
Fires sticky darts. Starting gun of The Cultist . Does not crack secret walls .
Starting gun of The Robot . Does not crack secret walls .
Starting weapon of The Bullet . Swings destroy nearby bullets. At full health, swings send out a piercing sword projectile. Does not crack secret walls .
Charged swings reflect nearby bullets. Does not crack secret walls . Increases curse by 2.
Fires faster right after a dodge roll.
Starting weapon of The Gunslinger . Reloading throws the gun, which has a chance to stun enemies. Does not crack secret walls .
Replaces Unfinished Gun once the Ammonomicon is complete.

Cheese ball: 5.5
Pointy cheese: 8
Cheese wheel: 15
Encases enemies in cheese, freezing them. Enemies that die while cheesed spawn a large cheese pool, which cheeses any enemies that step in it.
Fires rotating guns which fire bullets as they travel.
Fires three shotguns, each of which fires three bullets upon hitting something.
Has very low ammo, but regenerates 1 ammo if a shot hits an enemy.

Shoots a boxing glove with a chance to stun . Gains a star each time it kills an enemy, up to 3. When at 3 stars, can be charged to consume the stars and fire a high-damage super punch. Increases curse by 1.
Fires a burst of two bullets.
Fires bouncing bullets that aim towards enemies after bouncing.
Has 3 levels. Killing enough enemies causes the gun to level up, increasing its damage. Taking damage decreases its level by 1.
Fires large and rectangular bullets with high knockback.
Can be charged to fire more powerful shots.
Reloading an empty clip makes the player invisible. Can be used to steal from shops.
Has a chance to fire a critical shot which deals 20 times its damage.
Causes enemy souls to leave their bodies. Touching a soul deals high damage to the enemy.
Reloading alternates between a pistol and a continuous beam. Increases curse by 1.
Fires large piercing bullets that bounce twice.
Fires a random spread of three bullets.
Charged shot consumes all ammo in magazine and will activate a blank effect when it hits a wall.
Fires bullets that have a chance to burn enemies.

Decreases shop prices while held.
Fire rate increased shortly after rolling.
Fires five bullets in an arrow shape. Gains some pickups when reloading an empty clip.
Taking damage while GuNNER is held drains 40 ammo and drops a skull that heals the player upon pickup.
Fires three exploding shots that burst into bullets. Reloading next to Shotgun Kin sucks them up, killing them and restoring 1 ammo.
Better Than A Box Of Roses
Simultaneously fires a shotgun blast and a beam that has a chance to poison enemies.
Fires bubbles which move slowly towards enemies. Reloading the gun launches bubbles away from the player at high speed.
Fires a cone spread of bullets with high knockback.
Fires a shotgun blast of rectangular bullets that bounce off walls. Enemies hit will be folded into a rectangle.
Fires 6 purple bullets with high knockback.
Shoots a large slow projectile that will split up in a barrage of small bullets shortly afterwards.
Shoots a shotgun burst of skulls, nails, regular bullets, and poison bullets that leave pools of poison goop.
Has a chance to Charm enemies.
Fires a spread of 5 bullets that leave small pools of poison goop.
Fires a large burst of piercing, bouncing bullets. Clip size is increased by 1 for each half heart the player is missing, and healing decreases clip size.
Fires a short-ranged spray of bullets.
Fires a shotgun blast spread of 6 bullets.
Fires a shotgun blast of bullets that leave pools of water. Negates fall damage and goop effects while equipped.
Can be charged to fire the entire magazine at once, which will cause it to fire piercing, bouncing bullets.
The first two shots fire a shotgun blast of ice bullets, and the final shot fires a single explosive shot.
Fires a shotgun blast of bouncing green bullets that split into more bouncing green bullets.
Fires a shotgun blast of bullets. Reloading destroys nearby bullets. Increases curse by 1.
Fires shotgun blasts of blue bullets with high knockback.
Reloading inflicts fear on nearby enemies.
Fires bolts. Starting gun of The Hunter .
Fires bolts that stick to enemies and explode upon reloading.
Fires a shotgun blast of bolts.
Reloading alternates between triple bolts and single bolts that slow enemies.
Fires stars that split into smaller bouncing stars.
Fires a fast, piercing projectile that ricochets many times.
Fires nails that explode upon releasing the trigger.
Opening a locked chest or door with the gun equipped opens it for free. Alternatively, shooting a locked chest or door unlocks it.
Sits on the player's head and rapidly fires homing bullets. While held, inflicts fear on nearby enemies. Increases curse by 1.
Sits atop the player's head and fires bullets in all directions.
Reloading alternates between bursts of 3 bullets and a grenade launcher.
Reloading alternates between a rapid-fire rifle and a bouncing, piercing energy ball.
Rapidly fires homing bullets. The final bullet in each clip fires a random explosive (grenade, rocket, or drill).
Fires purple bullets, which start at the wall the gun is aimed at and travel back towards the gun. Bullets will curve and home in on enemies as they travel.
Fires planets which start orbiting the player if they hit a wall or obstacle.
Bullets close to each other will form links between each other, which hurts enemies on touch.
Fires small homing tornadoes. While held, grants flight but loses all ammo on taking damage.
Fires a burst of four bullets.
Changes form based on how much ammo it has left.
Rapidly fires invisible bullets. Jammed enemies hit will revert to normal.

Fires piercing bullets.
Fire rate increases rapidly as the trigger is held.
Becomes more powerful if the player has armor.
Bullets create poison puddles on impact.
Greatly increases movement speed while held. Reloading clears nearby goop and refills the gun's ammo.
Locks onto enemies and fires high speed homing lasers. Invisibility while reloading an empty magazine.
Rapidly fires burning bullets that have a chance to inflict Burn .
Fires bullets that can pierce through one enemy.
Fires bullets that can pierce through one enemy.
Fires slow, bouncing bullets that accelerate and curve towards enemies.
Fires a fast-moving piercing bullet that bounces many times.
Fires a single powerful bullet that will explode upon impact.
The final shot of each clip has a chance to poison, freeze or ignite enemies. (likely more effects possible)
Calls down a controllable orbital laser.
Charged shots are larger and deal more damage.
Fires lasers that bounce four times.
Fires bouncing lasers with limited range.
Created when both RUBE-ADYNE Prototype and RUBE-ADYNE MK.II are picked up. Rapidly fires bouncing lasers.
Transforms based on the current chamber.
Gains persist experience and levels up with kills, changing its appearance and stats.
Reloading alternates between firing three small, piercing, parallel lasers and single large lasers.
Shoots piercing lasers with a chance to stun .
In each magazine, the first 10 bullets pierce. The last 10 deal half damage.
Fires a barrage of bullets. The last shot in the magazine is a hammer, which deals extra damage and can stun enemies.
Has a chance to transmogrify enemies into snakes.
Damage increases for the next magazine depending on the number of reload attempts during its reload.
Shoots rapid fire white bolts of energy.
Rapidly fires piercing sound waves that have a small chance to stun.
Reloading swings the gun around, reflecting nearby bullets. Increases curse by 2.
Fires two bullets in a helix pattern.
Fires a burst of three lasers.
Fires bullets that slow and have a chance to freeze .
Increases coolness by 2. When reloading, if the reload button is hit at the right time, the gun's damage is increased. Failing a reload resets the damage.
Fires a large laser that pierces enemies and bounces off of walls two times. Laser deals higher damage after bouncing.
Charge shot consumes the entire clip to create a room-wide explosion and blank effect.
Fires a large bullet, which will split into 10 bullets which seek out enemies.
Fires a burst of four bullets connected by electricity.
Shoots a grenade that bounces off of surfaces and explodes on impact with enemies.
Fires homing rockets that explode into bees.
Fires rockets which burst into more homing rockets. While held, grants a ghost companion that follows the player and reveals the contents of nearby chests.
Fires rockets guided by the player's cursor.
Rapidly fires homing rockets. Bypasses the boss DPS cap.
Fires a bomb that bounces off of walls and explodes on enemy contact.
Fires a single powerful blast that has very strong recoil.
Fires bursts of four large energy balls, which home in on enemies and explode upon impact.
Reloading alternates between a rapid fire pistol and a beam weapon that can set enemies on fire.
Fires bullets that have a chance to transmogrify enemies.
Fires piercing bullets that have a chance to transmogrify enemies.
Shooting creates a small cone of fire in front of the player that burns enemies.
Hitting an enemy three times causes a genie to punch them.
Fires slow homing ghosts that shoot and deal contact damage.
Fires laser shots at enemies. The last bullet of magazine fires a crystal, which splits into 5 small crystals on impact.

First Stage: 6
Second Stage: 9
Third Stage: 12
Cannot be used to reveal hidden walls. Grows stronger with each room cleared.
Fires a rainbow beam that homes in on enemies. Increases curse by 1.
Fires blue lasers. Charging the weapon makes it fire lasers in four directions.
Fires big bullets that have a chance to freeze .
Fires drills that home in on enemies, stun them, and explode after a short delay.
Fires darts that home in on enemies and explode after a short delay. The darts deal minimal damage on contact.
Has 2 levels of damage depending on how long the gun has been charged.
Fires a continuous beam that has a chance to inflict Burn and slightly homes in on enemies.
Has 3 levels of damage depending on how long the gun has been charged.
Fires a continuous beam and heavily pushes back the player.
Fires fireballs that pierce enemies and have a chance to set enemies on fire.
Shoots fiery javelins that make enemies take damage over time.
Reloading alternates between firing a gatling gun, and a single shot exploding rocket punch that is guided by the player's reticle. The rocket punch consumes 10 ammo upon firing.
Fires snowballs that have a chance to freeze enemies.
Fires piercing, bouncing saw blades. Slightly increases movement speed.
Fires piercing anvils with high knockback and a chance to stun .
Fires a stream of oil. Reloading spits fire , which can ignite the oil.
Fires a green laser that slightly curves towards enemies and can poison .
Fires a blue laser that has a chance to freeze enemies.
Fires a large laser after a short charge-up, which inflicts random status effects on enemies.
Fires a large laser after a long charge-up.
Fires a stream of poison. Has a chance to poison enemies and leaves poison puddles on impact.
Fires a laser that homes in on all on-screen enemies.
Fires a beam that reflects off of solid objects once.
Fires a fish that has a chance to stun and leaves a pool of water on impact.
Reloading transforms the gun between a pistol and a shotgun.
Fires mail at enemies. The last bullet of each magazine is a package, which can explode, leave confetti, burn , or poison .
Fires a rapid stream of low damage nails. Fires faster if fire button is tapped rather than held.
Fires zaps of light at enemies. The last bullet in the magazine is a duck, which will automatically seek out the nearest enemy and attack them.
Fires a large, piercing, high-damage laser. Needs to recharge after each shot.
Melee weapon that extends itself to hit enemies. Increases curse by 1.
Fires bouncing explosive wood bullets and several leaves.
Fires bullets that hatch into many homing bullets upon hitting an enemy or obstacle.
Fires a trash bag that explodes into poison projectiles that leave trails of poison goop.
Fires bouncing ice cubes that explode and freeze enemies.
Fires paper planes that follow the player's crosshair.
Fires pots that break into 3 bouncing crystals upon hitting something.
Fires tears that leave behind puddles of water.
Fires water droplets. Can be charged to increase the number of droplets fired.
The last shot of each clip spawns a friendly Beadie .
Fires molotovs that create fire puddles on impact.
Fires a powerful beam. Loses all ammo upon taking damage.
Fires a steak that causes a tiger to appear and maul the target.
Fires piercing turtle shells that bounce off of walls.
Upon reloading, leaves a protective shield on the ground. Players in that area will be protected until the shield has absorbed a number of bullets.
Fires a burst of 6 bullets that spell out the word bullet.
Fires a burst of three piercing sword projectiles. Reloading swings the sword, destroying nearby bullets and damaging nearby enemies. Increases curse by 2.5.

Simultaneously fires music notes in four directions. Places an amplifier on the ground at the player's position upon reloading. Whenever the Face Melter is fired, the amplifier will fire music notes in the same pattern. Reloading again will remove the amplifier and place a new one.
Fires a long-range laser that pierces one enemy. Destroys nearby bullets and pushes enemies away while reloading.
Throws a boomerang-like projectile that homes in on multiple enemies, damaging and sometimes stunning them.
Fires a tentacle that homes in on and grips enemies, damaging them.
Fires a large, square, extremely slow bullet.
Fires random tetrominoes that stick to enemies. Line pieces explode, dealing more damage the more tetrominoes are stuck to an enemy.
Killing enemies evolves the gun through 6 forms.
In oil mode, creates oil puddles on impact. In fire mode, fires fireballs that pierce and burn . Reloading switches modes.
After killing an enemy, reloading damages all enemies in the room.
Rapid fire weapon that has a very short range, only damaging enemies that come into contact with the muzzle flash. Enemies damaged have a chance to catch on fire. Extremely high recoil.
Shoots various figurines, books, and gems at the cost of 1 coin per shot.
Shoots poisonous t-shirts with high knockback. Poisoned enemies create a poison puddle on death.
Fires t-shirts that have high knockback.
Fires an explosive banana that sends out three more bouncing explosive bananas.
Fires bees that home in on and damage enemies.
Fires zippers. Hitting an enemy with the swing of the weapon will stun the enemy.
Damages all enemies in the room, with a chance to stun .
Fires bullets in four directions. Combos can be entered to fire fireballs or a grappling hook. After running out of ammo, it is destroyed but spawns a chest.
Upon hitting an enemy, they will move in the same direction the player moves, and shoot towards the crosshair if the player shoots.
Rapidly fires inaccurate, piercing, homing arrows.
Fires bouncing rocks. Deals 2.5x damage to bosses and 2x damage after bouncing.
Fires black holes that attract enemies and enemy bullets.
Slowly charges up to fire a large high-damage projectile.
Fires sharks that swim around the room, seeking enemies and biting them.
Fires a single blast that deals a large amount of damage.
Has a chance to devolve enemies into simpler enemies.
